Naruto punches the enemy and jumps from their shoulders into the air where performs [[Multiple Shadow Clone Technique]] to create countless clones that throws each other at the enemy. Naruto proceeds with entering his [[Version 1|one-tailed form]].

[[pl:Taeigeki Rendan]]
